scripts.dev: PATH=./target/release:$PATH concurrently -n mesher,frontend,website -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:mesher" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:website"
scripts.dev:mesher: (docker start mesher-postgres 2>/dev/null || docker run -d --name mesher-postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=mesh -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mesh -e POSTGRES_DB=mesher -p 5432:5432 postgres:17-alpine) && until docker exec mesher-postgres pg_isready -U mesh -d mesher -q 2>/dev/null; do sleep 1; done && PATH=./target/release:$PATH meshc build mesher/ && cd mesher && ./mesher
